Description:
Detects service installation with suspicious folder patterns

Author: pH-T (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Service Installation with Suspicious Folder Pattern
Query: sourcetype='windows-system' eql select * from _source_ where ((provider_name = 'service control manager' and eventid = '7045') and (imagepath re '^[Cc]:\\[Pp]rogram[Dd]ata\\.{1,9}\.exe' and imagepath re '^[Cc]:\\.{1,9}\.exe'))
